ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: Field and laboratory assistance were provided by Austin Lynn, Carlie Barham, Elizabeth Hedrick, and Brianna Rodriguez. JAK was supported by the University of Missouri Prime Research Fund, and Zoë Moffett was supported by the Mountain Area Land Trust. The Colorado College Carter Herbarium provided access to specimens of P. viscosum and S. brachycarpa‐glauca. Access to field sites was granted by the Mountain Area Land Trust (Pennsylvania Mountain), the Pike National Forest (Hoosier Pass East and Weston Pass), and the White River National Forest (Hoosier Pass West). This paper is dedicated to the memory of our colleague, mentor and friend, Dr. Tass (Sylvia) Kelso.
